descrizioneBreve: An international culture-first creative agency based in Italy and Germany, recognized as a boutique agency focused on excellence.
descrizioneCompleta: Gusto IDS aka Studiogusto is a culture-first creative agency with over 20 years of experience creating all-round communication projects and boutique experiences. They specialize in strategic consulting and communication services, with a strong expertise in Made In Italy luxury and international excellence. Studiogusto is known for its passion for innovation, storytelling, and delivering high-quality creative solutions to clients worldwide.
tecnologieUtilizzate: Creative digital production, strategic consulting, luxury brand communication
settoriSpecializzazione: Made In Italy luxury, international excellence, culture-first creative projects
